lender.occupational_info: I'm an artist and a silversmith. I design and create silver jewelry and sell it at craft fairs and from my web site.

lender.name: Ole
lender.loan_because: I want to make the world more economically equal.
lender.occupational_info: I try to use science and technology where it is most helpful to people.

lender.name: Ben
lender.loan_because:
It's a small step towards something with a huge impact. It's a good feeling to help people that want to improve their lives but don't have all the necessary means to do so. As a student that's owning much in government loans for my studies, I still feel I live a privileged lifestyle and would like to contribute what I can to help others in need. My parents were raised in Viet Nam and I grew up with stories of their humble lifestyle; so it feels nice to help someone who is similarly in my parents' previous situation to improve their life. We all deserve to live a life of happiness and freedom from financial worries.
“Life's most persistent and urgent question is, 'What are you doing for others?'” - Martin Luther King, Jr
lender.occupational_info: I am currently in the UK studying Optometry

lender.name: Virginia
lender.loan_because: It's a way to help lend a helping hand to a deserving, hardworking fellow citizen of the world.

lender.name: Thaddeus
lender.occupation: Chairman and CEO Z Yard Sale.com

lender.name: Emma

lender.loan_because: I want to make it easier for nice people to improve their lives through their own work.

lender.loan_because: I BELIEVE IN GOOD, HONEST, HARD WORKING PEOPLE

lender.occupational_info:
I am prince, over these years I work with the UNITED NATION DEVELOPMENT PROGRAMES UNDP on humanitarian aids, with my experiences I decided creating schemes in which others might benefit from, this was my major reason of finding kiva a special places to help the needy, I create the prince Charles mother home under my charity holdings and loan venture which I am establishing with kiva members
I want other to reach me whenever there is a need, I can be contacted right here prince.ch@live.com

lender.name: Elizabeth

lender.name: Joe and Jenna

lender.name: Julie

Care more than others think is wise. Dream more than others think is practical. Expect more than others think is possible. " Cadet Maxium
lender.occupational_info: Help manage an office which provides customer service for financial aid, records and registration, admission and student accounts receivable at a large university.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: folks need help.
lender.occupational_info: I write software for businesses in the vacation rental industry. I also have a Maui-based, travel agency.

lender.name: John
lender.occupational_info: Helping anybody who needs help and giving to anyone who needs.

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: I have always tried to instill in my children a sense of social responsibility, so this is my way of giving back to other women in the world to help them have a better quality of life.

lender.name: Klaus

lender.name: maira
lender.loan_because: I think that it's important to help people with their small businesses.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I am a Christian and God commands us to help others. Member of First Assembly of God Hermitage, Pa. My pic is of my son and grandson.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: If everyone seeking opportunity moved to the US, the Earth would wobble out of orbit and climate change would be certainty. Besides, where you are is the best place to make a better future.
lender.occupational_info: La empresa que solía trabajar para el que está haciendo mal a causa de malversación de fondos y negligencia. Mis ahorros para la jubilación diezmados por gran parte de la misma en el gobierno y el sector financiero.

lender.name: Savannah
lender.loan_because: This is the best way I've heard about to directly help someone who needs money somewhere in the world, and it never has to end. Once you get repaid by one borrower, you can turn around and lend it to someone else in a never ending cycle.
lender.occupational_info: I work with newspapers, radio stations and television stations when a state has received federal disaster assistance to inform the public of how they can get funds to help them recover.

lender.loan_because: God has blessed me and I want to pass some of that blessing on to others.

lender.loan_because: Kiva is an incredible organization that helps others help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I study how your everyday environment influences how your body functions at the cellular level.

We specialize in optimizing and building Internet sites that result in better organic search rankings and are easily updated and provide analytic metrics. Your site should not just work, it should work for you.

lender.name: Sylvere
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.loan_because: We have been very lucky in life and its important to respect that and give back. These entrepenuers are really inspiring as they work to look after themselves and their families.

lender.name: Alex & Judy

lender.name: stevan
lender.loan_because: I recieved a gift certificate from my daughter for my birhtday. What a great concept. Somany people around the world are struggling to survive. It feels great to be involved in the struggle with them even on what is to me such a small level.
lender.occupational_info: I am a repair welder for an equipment dealer.

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: I have insatiable love and hope for all fellow humans. I'd like for them to be happy and fulfilled.

lender.loan_because: I am blessed.

lender.loan_because: I love the concept of micro lending and want to help a fellow seamstress/tailor build their business and be self sufficient.
lender.occupational_info: I design and manufacture historical costumes.

lender.name: June
lender.loan_because: I don't have a lot of money but I want to make a difference to help people who are really trying to make an honest living for themselves, their community and their families.
lender.occupational_info:
I am divorced and live in an apartment in Seattle, WA. I am kept very busy with work and do a lot of things outside of work with my friends and have a lot of fun hobbies.
I work in an area hospital as an administrative assistant in the Benefits department. I do a lot of different projects, create a lot of letters on the computer, tell all the new people that are hired about the benefits that the hospital will give them when they come to work for us. I also sing every once in a while at a jazz club and I also sing Opera.

lender.name: David
lender.occupation: Returning student and father to a daughter and son

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because: My 1st Kiva loan was a gift from my aunty so I keep re-loaning in the hope that it will make a positive difference in others lives

lender.name: joel
lender.loan_because: there are people in the world with real need

lender.name: Sonya
lender.loan_because: I trust the money is going to where I want it and not being spent on overheads or other causes. I am part of the global community and feel responsible to help when and where I can.
lender.occupational_info: I don't work - I am on a disability pension. Kiva provides me with a way to help others less fortunate.

lender.name: Nick and Chelsea
lender.loan_because: We have been blessed with everything we need, and we want to thank God by providing for the needs of others.

lender.name: Philippe
lender.loan_because: I believe in human courage and willing.

lender.name: Niall
lender.loan_because: It is the most sustainable way of priming the pump of enterprise among those motivated and fit to work their way out of a catastrophe.
lender.occupational_info: Helping corporations realize their true value

lender.name: Natalie
lender.loan_because: i live in australia where it is easier to get loans for businesses, homes and cars. Whereas in other countries it is not as easy so I enjoy knowing i can help others make a life for themselves and families. I also enjoy lending to people who are motivated and have get up and go. Rather than just being on welfare.
lender.occupational_info: I work in telecommunications as a wireless/mobile specialist working with large corporate companies.

lender.name: Craig
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Shane
lender.loan_because: I want to help others achieve what they hope to do
lender.occupational_info: I run an online marketing company managing advertising on Google, Yahoo and MSN

lender.name: Troy
lender.loan_because: I can. But in reality, I loan money to third people less fortunate than me because: - it eases some of my white man guilt. Talk about being born with the odds on my side. Goes to show that its all just a roll of the dice whether someone begins life in poverty and has a good chance of remaining there for the rest of their life; - it spreads my income around for mine and my family's contribution to the world's social and environmental problems; and - I like to feel connected to the wider world in more ways by interacting with other people outside of my own country.
lender.occupational_info: I listen to two sides of an argument about money, investments or insurance, and then help them discuss the main issues in order to find out whether they can agree. If they're unwilling or unable to agree, I then tell them how I think the argument should be resolved. Its up to them whether they agree with me or not. I must have some sense of what's fair and reasonable though because both people often do end up agreeing with me, and usually satisfied with the outcomes I help them get.

lender.name: Anita
lender.occupational_info: We do all hair types, specializing in natural hair, we have created a product line that is all natural. we also do hair for community progams, such as rehab, homeless, and women & men getting back into the work force. We are raising money to launch our product line this fall.

lender.name: Agnese
lender.loan_because: I like to share the good fortune that I enjoy in my life and I like to help others who have less than me.

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping someone who might need a little help. Today it is so hard to find someone to help but with Kiva, so many people have found the help.
lender.occupational_info: I own a gift shop and I wholesale and retail.

lender.name: impActs
lender.loan_because: I believe that lending with heart will change the world.
lender.occupational_info: graduate student at Columbia University in the City of New York

lender.name: Melinda
lender.loan_because: I previously owned a bakery/coffee shop, and unfortunately was forced to close to deal with a death in my immediate family. I had worked very hard to build this business and profitted over $60,000. in my first year of business. 4 years later, I have gone out and slowly bought all my equipment cheap by attending auctions and such. I have obtained a VERY reasonable rental property, with highend traffic volume. But now towards the end, the plumbing, because of limited space for piping, is going to be expensive. i need help with financing this final phase to go forward.
lender.occupational_info: I have been in management for nearly 20 years, and after surviving the turmoil in my life of losing a loved one, I want to reopen my bakery/coffee shop business. I have experience with working with the 'main street program', inwhich the focus is on creating an environment and events to bring your local community together. That is our goal with trying to use other local businesses through our business.

lender.name: Dave Crenshaw
lender.loan_because: I believe that helping people through micro-lending is not a hand out, but a hand up.

lender.name: Mobile Managing, LLC
lender.occupational_info:
Thank you for your interest in doing business with Mobile Managing, LLC. We look forward to providing all of your administrative and contractual needs on an as needed basis. We have over ten (10) years of administrative and managerial experience, which primarily consists of working in the public sector of city government (operations and contracting). We work as independent contractors. Therefore, we are the solution to minimizing the overhead costs that some business and entrepreneurs face as a new start up or small business.
The advantage to this scenario is that our clients don't incur the additional costs of healthcare coverage for employees, paying a full time employee, rental of office space and other associated overhead costs. The other advantage is that our clients have the option to customize their own packages based upon their needs and/or the needs of their business. We offer a wide range of services that you are sure to benefit from. We work on an as needed basis to provide services to businesses and individuals using traditional and non-traditional means of communications via internet access, fax, telephone, mail courier services, file transfer, remote access and more.
Mobile Managing, LLC is your number one source for professional service. We surpass the competition in not only price but value as well. It is our mission to provide professional and quality virtual administrative, contracting and personal assistant services to individuals and businesses on a mobile basis, which means we come to you when you need us. As your personal Virtual Assistant (VA), we provide professional administrative, managerial, business office and personal/concierge services.
We use the most advanced means of communication and the newest and most efficient, time saving office products and work delivery regardless of geographical boundaries. Our assignments are on a contractual basis. As professionals, we abide by an established Code of Ethics requiring integrity, honesty and due diligence. Let us work with you to customize a package to fit your unique needs!

lender.name: Simon
lender.loan_because: I have been given much.
lender.occupational_info: Help college students understand the world is a wonderful place, where everyone has a place and can contribute!

lender.name: Tage
lender.loan_because: i want to make the world a better place

lender.name: Megan
lender.loan_because: I am very fortunate. I have a loving family, lots of friends, a good job and the best coffee shop in the world to hang out at. It is only fair that I give back in anyway I can.
lender.occupational_info: Right now I work at in Ice Cream parlor serving ice cream and making cones. I will be attending Pepperdine University in January to continue my education.

lender.name: Betty
lender.loan_because: I am an entrepreneur that understands the importance of supporting others. Kiva provides me the opportunity of helping in communities around the world.

lender.name: donald
lender.loan_because: i am starting a small business that is a security Consulting & Pilot Car Service and am looking for around 30,000
lender.occupational_info: secutrity Consulting Service the customer comes to me and then i find the vendors to install the Closed Circut tv, Burgular, and Fire & Access systems and continue to work with the client on improvments and other problems that can come up Pilot Car Service i arrange for big oversize loads to be moved by truck and other means and also arrange for permits and the trucks to move the loads and privides for routing to gret the loads safe for their destinations

lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I use traditional Chinese medicine (acupuncture, herbal medicine, massage and the like) to help people who have not gotten the help they need from other forms of medicine, and have worked in Guatemalan refugee areas as well as in the U.S. I also have a website that instructs people on a certain aspect of western marriage ceremonies, and donate the money I make from that to Kiva (see website below).

lender.occupational_info: I work for a part of the United States government that supports small business here. I help let people know about what we do and how they can take advantage of our programs.

lender.name: Fashion Fights Poverty
lender.loan_because: FFP's mission is to raise awareness for initiatives that encourage and support creative, effective, and sustainable means of challenging poverty. We believe that the industries of fashion, textiles, and design offer unique and effective opportunities for designers, craftsmen, and consumers alike to contribute to the alleviation of poverty through trade, skill-building, and community empowerment.
lender.occupational_info: 1. Support global projects that provide opportunities to artisans in developing countries 2. Showcase leading eco/ethical fashion designers in one of DC's premier runway shows 3. Support future design/fashion leaders locally and globally 4. Serve as a leading education resource to consumers and those in the industry

lender.name: Austin
lender.loan_because: If you give a man a fish, you feed him for a day. If you teach a man to fish, you feed him for a lifetime. I prefer to give a hand up rather than a hand out. Kiva seems like a great way to do just that.
lender.occupational_info: We have been blessed with multiple businesses and love to create something from nothing.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: My daughter gave me a gift certificate last Christmas to get me started. We shared a moment together in Ethiopia years ago when we wondered what we could do to help those in need. Although my KIVA loan is small thing, it is something and I believe it helps. It seems like a wonderful idea to me.
lender.occupational_info: My job is to try to support and improve the technology in our school. I spend a lot of time dealing with the government to apply for various kinds of financial aide. I also help to solve problems that people in our school have with our computers, printers, projectors, and other technology assets.

lender.name: Raina
lender.loan_because: Everyone in this world is essentially a good person, and deserves the help of other people.

lender.loan_because: peace on earth, good will toward men.

lender.occupational_info: I am engaged in aquariums already more than 7 years, and I consider myself as the professional in this business. More than two years I grow up aquarian plants. First it was simple as a hobby, but in due course it переросло in stable business. Also I am engaged in cultivation of aquarian shrimps, but it while as a hobby.

lender.loan_because: It is something that I can do that helps someone directly.

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: My son introduced me to Kiva by means of as a gift certificate on father's day. I'm just beginning.
lender.occupational_info: I have just published a book titled, "Bush Medicine of the Bahamas: A Cross-cultural Perspective from San Salvador Island, including Pharmacology and Oral Histories."

lender.loan_because: the investment in another human being is a blessing of the heart. You must be the change you wish to see in the world.

lender.name: Lyn

lender.occupational_info: Entrepreneur changing goals, previous work was too expensive and the workers comp ate up all of the profit for our business, previously did forestry work but have recently decided to study to train as a Realtime Court Reporter, Broadcast Captioner, CART Provider and need help with getting the training manuals, stenomachine and supplies to get started. I hope to have gained the knowledge to teach others the professional here on the Pine Ridge Indian Reservation so that they can have the opportunity to make a better place in society for themselves and their families.
